name: red-scarf
effect: Held: Increases the holder’s Coolness during a Super Contest’s Visual Competition.
short_effect: Raises the holder’s Coolness while in a contest.

flavor_text.black-white: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts the Cool aspect of the holder in a Contest.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts the Cool aspect of the holder in a Contest.
